question: You are John, the project leader for a team of 20 members. As the team members are not submitting the weekly time sheets regularly, you need to email them stressing the need to submit without fail. Using the following phrases, write an email to your team members informing the same.
phrases: can be accessed online - lead to loss of pay - every week - do not default - used to bill client - actual working hours - by friday - failure to adhere - time sheet filling application
